ntdr_pas_path: >> CHANGE THIS TO THE PATH OF YOUR LOCAL NTDR-PAS <<
inventory_path: >> CHANGE THIS TO THE PATH OF YOUR LOCAL FILE WITH SERVER HOSTS <<
remote_site_root: >> CHANGE THIS TO THE PATH OF YOUR REMOTE ROOT WEBSITE FOLDER (E.G. /var/www) <<
vault_password: >> CHANGE THIS TO THE PASSWORD THAT vault.json.aes IS ENCRYPTED WITH <<
